description: Source file defining a custom web component 'todo-app' for a TodoMVC application, managing todo items, routing, and UI updates.

classes.name: TodoApp
classes.description: Custom HTML element implementing a TodoMVC application with internal state management, event handling, and routing.

methods.name: addItem
methods.description: Adds a new todo item to internal data and updates the list display.

methods.name: toggleItem
methods.description: Toggles the completion status of a specific todo item.

methods.name: removeItem
methods.description: Removes a todo item from internal data and updates the display.

methods.name: updateItem
methods.description: Updates the title of a specific todo item.

methods.name: toggleItems
methods.description: Toggles all todo items' completion status.

methods.name: update
methods.description: Updates UI attributes based on current data state.

methods.name: addListeners
methods.description: Attaches event listeners to UI components.

methods.name: removeListeners
methods.description: Removes event listeners from UI components.

methods.name: routeChange
methods.description: Handles route changes and updates the view accordingly.

methods.name: connectedCallback
methods.description: Lifecycle method called when element is added to DOM; initializes component.

methods.name: disconnectedCallback
methods.description: Lifecycle method called when element is removed from DOM; cleans up.
